meta.name: description
meta.content: Winfree Academy is a nationally recognized free public high school that has been serving the DFW area for 20 years. Providing specialized services to ensure all have the option of education.

div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 2048px; height: 1064px;

img.alt: Dr. Stubblefield and our mascot Scrappy smiling and waving during graduation.

div.div: Winfree Academy Charter Schools utilizes a comprehensive high school curriculum that is offered via flexible individualized delivery system utilizing online curriculum and constant availability. Our highly experienced educators are available to help students in the early morning hours, throughout the day, and into the early evening, spending the extra time and the extra care to increase student achievement. They use effective methods of teaching to motivate and nurture the students’ to success. Emphasis is placed on preparing students to be college and career ready while completing all requirements to earn a high school diploma.

ul.li:
Serving the community
for over 17 years
Serving students in grades 9-12 and ages 14-26
Students attend from 86 ISDs in North Texas

Winfree Academy is a
FREE public school

div.div: It is that time of the year to let us know your plans to enroll your learner at Winfree Academy 2020-2021.

h1.a: Winfree Academy Campuses Closed - At Home Learning to Begin 3/24/2020

img.alt: Winfree Academy Campuses Closed - At Home Learning to Begin 3/24/2020 Thumbnail Image

div.div: Winfree Academy Charter Schools has closed all locations indefinitely. Winfree’s At-Home Learning will commence beginning Tuesday, March 24 2020. Learners who do not have internet or a device to work from home should call 214-WINFREE if they have not already responded to the survey.

h1.a: Winfree Academy Closed for Learners March 16-20

img.alt: Winfree Academy Closed for Learners March 16-20 Thumbnail Image

h1.a: Texas Academic Performance Report Public Hearing

div.div: Winfree Academy Charter Schools will be conducting a public meeting to discuss the 2018-2019 Texas Academic Performance Report. The meeting will be held at the administrative office: 1555 Valwood Parkway Suite 160, Carrollton, Texas, 75006 on Tuesday, January 21st, 2020 at 5:00 PM. If you are unable to attend, a copy will be placed on our website for your review.

img.alt: Safety and Security Committee Meeting Thumbnail Image

div.div: Winfree Academy Charter Schools' Safety and Security Committee shall meet to review and update the School’s multi-hazard emergency operations, ensure that planning, training and exercises are conducted in collaboration with first responders, local emergency management personnel, neighboring school, local health authorities and appropriate state and federal agency representatives.

img.alt: Targeted Improvement Plan Public Meeting Thumbnail Image

div.div: You are invited to attend our public meeting on Thursday, September 19th at 5:00pm to give input and feedback on our plan. The meeting will be held at your learner's campus.

div.section: Board Members Mikeela Hudson Mark Hoffman Gabrielle McCormick Susan Younger Greg Ward Mike Newhouse
